DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether the McGrath MAC videolaryngoscope is superior when compared to the C-MAC videolaryngoscope and the Macintosh laryngoscope for novice users in manikin.
DOC.brief_title: The Comparison of Mcgrath Mac, C-MAC, and Macintosh Laryngoscope in Novice Users: a Manikin Study
